name: Lina
title: Slayer
lore: Lina was born with a fire within her that grew stronger each day. She learned to wield flames with deadly precision.

dragonSlave.name: Dragon Slave
dragonSlave.description: Sends a wave of fire that damages all enemies in a line.

lightStrikeArray.name: Light Strike Array
lightStrikeArray.description: Calls down a pillar of flame that stuns and damages enemies in an area.

fieryaoul.name: Fiery Soul
fieryaoul.description: Each spell cast grants Lina bonus attack and movement speed for a duration.

lagunaBlade.name: Laguna Blade
lagunaBlade.description: Fires a bolt of lightning that deals massive damage to a single target.

25: Laguna Blade Pure and Pierces Immunity
